10 hilarious facts about Kim Jong-un

    Shares

Kim Jong-un is the supreme leader of North Korea. Kim is the second child of Kim Jong-il (1941–2011) and Ko Yong-hui. Many of the activities of Kim and his government remain unknown. Here are the lists of 10 unknown facts of Kim Jong Un.

  1. He attended school in Switzerland secretly as “Pak Un”.
  2. He never passed any exams and stayed fascinated with basketball and computer games.
  3. He is to this day, a huge basketball fan.
  4. He was once caught with a bondage magazine in his school bag and he’s a ladies’ man.
  5. At 27, he underwent plastic surgery to allegedly resemble his grandfather Kim Il Sung.
  6. At 29 years of age, The Onion newspaper announced him as the “Sexiest Man Alive” for the year 2012.
  7. He has a severe addiction to Swiss cheese.
  8. He cuts his hair by himself and travels with his own toilet.
  9. His best friends is NBA-star Dennis Rodman.
  10. Those who didn’t go to his father mourning events were reportedly being sentenced to labor camps for six months. (Agencies)
